title: SGPGIMS Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 02 Project Research Scientist and Other Posts
description: Sanjay Gandhi Postgraduate Institute of Medical Sciences (SGPGIMS), Lucknow, has released a recruitment notification for the engagement of eligible candidates to Project Research Scientist I and Project Technical Support III positions. Those candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E/ B.Tech., B.Sc can apply for the SGPGIMS Recruitment 2025.
